headline: Analyst Explains What ‘Caught’ His Attention About Oracle (ORCL)- ‘Late-90s Kind of Vibes’
summary: We recently published Top 10 Trending Stocks Everyone’s Watching in Q4. Oracle Corp (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the trending stocks everyone’s watching.
